name: Druid
shortDescription: Primal spellcasters who draw power from nature and the wilds.
description: Druids are guardians of the natural world, wielding primal magic to heal, control the battlefield, and transform into beasts through their bond with nature.

spellcasting.description: Druids prepare spells from the druid spell list, channeling primal magic drawn from the natural world.

features.name: Druidic
features.description: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast druid spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

features.name: Wild Shape
features.description: You can use your action to magically assume the shape of a beast you have seen before.

features.name: Druid Circle
features.description: Choose a Druid Circle that represents your connection to nature.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.
